title: DeRay Mckesson | Trump Threatens War with Iran on Saudi Arabia’s Behalf: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump threatening war with Iran after months of saying he didn’t want a war with Iran.

Then, DeRay Mckesson explains how he became a civil rights activist and talks about his book On the Other Side of Freedom: The Case for Hope. He also takes a few more questions backstage exclusively for this podcast.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
